title: Accounting
description:
# Introduction
The Xero Accounting API is a RESTful web service and uses the OAuth (v1.0a) protocol to authenticate 3rd party applications. The Accounting API exposes accounting and related functions of the main Xero application and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating transactions like invoices and credit notes, right through to extracting accounting data via our reports endpoint.

get_Accounts.title: Retrieve the full chart of accounts

get_ContactGroups.title: Retrieve a collection of contact groups

get_ContactGroups__ContactGroupID_.title: Retrieve the ContactID and Name of all the contacts in a contact group

delete_ContactGroups__ContactGroupID__Co.title: Remove all contacts from a contact group

put_ContactGroups__ContactGroupID__Conta.title: Add contacts to a contact group

delete_ContactGroups__ContactGroupID__Co.title: Remove a contact from a contact group

get_CreditNotes.title: Retrieve a collection of credit notes

post_CreditNotes.title: Create or update a credit note

get_Invoices.title: Retrieve a collection of invoices (sales invoices and bills)

post_Invoices.title: Create or update an Invoice (sales invoices or bills)

put_Invoices.title: Create an Invoice (sales invoices or bills)

get_Invoices__InvoiceID_.title: Retrieve an Invoice (sales invoice or bill)

post_Invoices__InvoiceID_.title: Update an Invoice (sales invoice or bill)

get_Invoices__InvoiceID__OnlineInvoice.title: Retrieve the URL to view the online invoice

get_LinkedTransactions.title: Retrieve a collection of linked transactions (billable expenses)

post_LinkedTransactions.title: Create or update a linked transaction (billable expense)

get_Payments.title: Retrieve a collection of payments for invoices, credit notes, prepayments and overpayments

post_Payments__PaymentID_.title: Update a payment's status to deleted

get_PurchaseOrders.title: Retrieve a collection of purchase orders

post_Qoutes.title: create or update one or many quotes

get_RepeatingInvoices.title: Retrieve a collection of repeating invoice templates

get_RepeatingInvoices__RepeatingInvoiceI.title: Retrieve an individual repeating invoice template

get_file_association.title: GET the associations for a file

get_file_association_of_object.title: Get the associations for an object

put_file.title: Rename File and move to different folder
